hizbs.text: avarkk (paricaranattinayi) ceruppakkar avarute atutt currittirinnu keantirikkum. avar suksicc vekkappetta muttukal pealeyirikkum
parasparam palatum ceadiccu keant avaril cilar cilare abhimukhikarikkum
avar parayum: tirccayayum nam mump nam'mute kutumbattilayirikkumpeal bhayabhaktiyullavarayirunnu
atinal allahu namukk anugraham nalkukayum, reamakupannalil tulaccu kayarunna narakagniyute siksayil ninn avan nam'me katturaksikkukayum ceytu
tirccayayum nam mumpe avaneat prart'thikkunnavarayirunnu. tirccayayum avan tanneyakunnu audaryavanum karunanidhiyum
akayal ni ulbeadhanam ceyyuka. ninre raksitavinre anugrahattal ni oru jyeatsyanea, bhrantanea alla
atalla, (muham'mad‌) oru kaviyan‌, avann kalavipatt varunnat nannal kattirikkukayan ennanea avar parayunnat‌
ni parannekkuka: ninnal kattirunnealu. tirccayayum nanum ninnaleateappam kattirikkunnavarute kuttattilakunnu
atalla, avarute manas'sukal avareat iprakaram kalpikkukayanea? atalla, avar dhikkarikalaya oru janata tanneyanea
atalla, addeham (nabi) at ketticcamaccu parannatan enn avar parayukayanea? alla, avar visvasikkunnilla
ennal avar satyavanmaranenkil itu pealulla oru vrttantam avar keantuvaratte
atalla, yatearu vastuvil ninnumallate avar srstikkappettirikkukayanea? atalla, avar tanneyanea srastakkal
atalla, avaranea akasannalum bhumiyum srsticcirikkunnat‌? alla, avar drdhamayi visvasikkunnilla
atalla, avarute pakkalanea ninre raksitavinre khajanavukal! atalla, avaranea adhikaram natattunnavar
atalla, avarkk (akasattu ninn‌) vivarannal srad'dhiccu kelkkan valla keaniyumuntea? ennal avarile srad'dhicc kelkkunna al vyaktamaya valla pramanavum keantuvaratte
atalla, avannu (allahuvinu)llat penmakkalum ninnalkkullat anmakkalumanea
atalla, ni avareat valla pratiphalavum ceadiccitt avar katabadhyatayal bharam perentavarayirikkukayanea
atalla, avarkk adrsyajnanam karagatamavukayum, at avar rekhappetuttivekkukayum ceyyunnuntea
atalla, avar valla kutantravum natattan uddesikkukayanea? ennal satyanisedhikalarea avar tanneyan kutantrattil akappetunnavar
atalla, avarkk allahuvallatta valla daivavumuntea? avar pankucerkkunnatil ninnellam allahu etrayea parisud'dhanayirikkunnu
akasattuninn oru kasnam vilunnatayi avar kanukayanenkilum avar parayum: at atukkatukkaya meghamanenn‌
atinal avar beadharahitarayi vilttappetunna avarute a divasam avar kantumuttunnat vare ni avare vittekkuka
avarute kutantram avarkk ottum prayeajanam ceyyatta, avarkk sahayam labhikkatta oru divasam
tirccayayum akramam pravartticcavarkk atinu purameyum siksayunt‌. pakse avaril adhikaperum manas'silakkunnilla

ninre raksitavinre tirumanattin ni ksamapurvvam kattirikkuka. tirccayayum ni nam'mute drstiyilakunnu. ni elunnelkkunna samayatt ninre raksitavine stutikkunnateateappam avanre parisud'dhiye ni prakirttikkukayum ceyyuka
ratriyil kuracc samayavum naksatrannal pinvannumpealum ni avanre parisud'dhiye prakirttikkuka
naksatram astamikkumpeal atine tanneyana, satyam
ninnalute kuttukaran valiterriyittilla. durmargiyayittumilla
addeham tannistaprakaram sansarikkunnumilla
at addehattin divyasandesamayi nalkappetunna oru ulbeadhanam matramakunnu
saktimattaya kalivullavanan (jib‌ril enna malakkan‌) addehatte pathippiccittullat‌
karuttulla oru vyakti. annane addeham (saksal rupattil) nilakeantu
addehamakatte atyunnatamaya mandalattilayirunnu
pinne addeham atuttu vannu. annane kututal atuttu
annane addeham rantu villukalute akalattilea atinekkal atuttea ayirunnu
appeal avan (allahu) tanre dasan avan beadhanam nalkiyatellam beadhanam nalki
addeham kanta a kalca (addehattinre) hrdayam nisedhiccittilla
ennirikke addeham (neril) kanunnatinre peril ninnal addehatteat tarkkikkukayanea
marrearu irakkattilum addeham malakkine kantittunt‌
arratte ilantamarattinatutt vecc‌
atinnatuttakunnu tamasikkanulla svargam
a ilantamaratte avaranam ceyyunnateakke atine avaranam ceytirunnappeal
(nabiyute) drsti terripeayittilla. atikramiccupeayittumilla
tirccayayum tanre raksitavinre atimahattaya drstantannalil cilat addeham kanukayuntayi
lattayeyum us'sayeyum parri ninnal cinticcu neakkiyittuntea
vere munnamatayulla manattaye parriyum
(santanamayi) ninnalkk anum allahuvin pennumanennea
enkil at nitiyillatta oru ohari vekkal tanne

ninnalum ninnalute pitakkalum namakaranam ceyta cila perukalallate marreannumalla ava (devatakal.) avayepparri allahu yatearu pramanavum irakkitannittilla. uhatteyum manas'sukal icchikkunnatineyum matraman avar pintutarunnat‌. avarkk tannalute raksitavinkal ninn sanmargam vannittunt tanum
atalla, manusyan avan meahiccatanea labhikkunnat‌
ennal allahuvinnakunnu ihaleakavum paraleakavum
